metadata.title: CVE-2022-0099 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Sign-in in Google Chrome prior to 97.0.4692.71 allowed aremote attacker who convinced a user to perform specific user gestures topotentially exploit heap corruption via specific user gesture.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
